attributes.action: re-instate the 'Dubs' amendment to help unaccompanied child migrants
attributes.background: hours before the vote on the Article 50 bill, the Home Office quietly published a written statement making clear that no more than 350 unaccompanied Syrian child refugees would be admitted to Britain under the hard won Dubs Amendment. Human rights charities have been united in their condemnation

rejection.details:
This petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/183943
